Returns: ArrayList of frozen representations of the object present in the provided list.
freeze(java.util.ArrayList<E>).Description: Utility helper method to freeze a list of freezable entities into a list of concrete entities. The list provided here must contain elements that implement the @B_com#google#android#gms#common#data#Freezable_E@ interface. Type T is the type of object returned by freezing an element of the list. In most cases, this will be the same as E. Type E is the type of object contained in the list. Must implement @B_com#google#android#gms#common#data#Freezable_E@.

Returns: ArrayList of frozen representations of the object present in the provided array.

Type T is the type of object returned by freezing an element of the array. In most cases, this will be the same as E. Type E is the type of object contained in the array. Must implement @B_com#google#android#gms#common#data#Freezable_E@.

Returns: ArrayList of frozen representations of the object present in the provided array.
